alert.note: Alert for Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 9:28PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT FLAGLER...SOUTHEASTERN ST. JOHNS AND EASTERN PUTNAM COUNTIES THROUGH 1015 PM EDT... At 928 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles west of Marineland, or 10 miles southeast of Hastings, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Palm Coast, Saint Augustine, Palatka, Flagler Beach, Bunnell, Crescent City, Pomona Park, Hastings, East Palatka, and Andalusia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns; Western Putnam
